author: Carolyn Ray
title: Chinese community in N.S. donates thousands to QEII to help fight COVID-19
description: Leaders in Nova Scotia's Chinese community are spearheading a campaign to buy equipment to help fight COVID-19 at the QEII Hospital in Halifax, and the hospital's foundation is hoping more people can get on board.
content:
Leaders in Nova Scotia's Chinese community are spearheading a campaign to buy equipment to help fight COVID-19 at the QEII Hospital in Halifax, and the hospital's foundation is hoping more people can get on board.
Just a few months ago, Jinyu Sheng said the … [+2764 chars]
